Appetizers.name: Bloomin' Onion
Appetizers.description: A delicious onion, dipped in a creamy bread crumb batter, and then sliced into strips that easily be pulled off.

Cold Sandwhiches.name: The Clubbed Turkey
Cold Sandwhiches.description: Hand crafted with love, this delectable turkey sandwich is sure to club your expectations

Hot Sandwhiches.name: The Beeferino
Hot Sandwhiches.description: This sandwich recreates the feeling of being taken around New York City in a Handsome Cab that is being pulled by a rather flatulent horse.

Hot Sandwhiches.name: The David Copperfield
Hot Sandwhiches.description: Become a magician by making this delicious sandwhich disappear in under 15 seconds.

Desserts.name: Drakes Coffee Cake
Desserts.description: If used as a bribe, this delicious pastry is sure to dissuade your nemesis from telling your next door neighbor that you were having an affair with his wife while he was in a coma.

Desserts.name: Hostess Cupcakes
Desserts.description: They're Hostess cupcakes, you know what they are!

Drinks.name: The Honeymoon
Drinks.description: If used as a bribe, this delicious pastry is sure to dissuade your nemesis from telling your next door neighbor that you were having an affair with his wife while he was in a coma.

Drinks.name: Original Coca Cola
Drinks.description: Surgeon General Warning: cocaine is addictive, albeit delicious.
